title: The Zion Williamson Debut, featuring Zion, David Griffin and Alvin Gentry
description:
Zion Williamson (0:29), David Griffin (5:41) and Alvin Gentry (14:35) join The Woj Pod on the night of the No. 1 pick's debut in New Orleans to go inside the comeback, the debut, the wild fourth quarter, the decision to pull him out of the game, his body and much more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
